title: How to Set Up Online Booking with Calendly
description: Let customers book appointments directly on your calendar. No more phone tag.
requirements: Your general availability (what hours you take appointments)

steps.title: Create a Calendly account
steps.description: Go to calendly.com and sign up for free.
substeps: Click 'Sign up' in the top right
Enter your email or use Google sign-in
Choose the free plan when asked

steps.title: Set your availability
steps.description: Tell Calendly when you're available for appointments.
substeps: Block off lunch or other busy times
steps.tip: Leave buffer time between appointments — you don't want back-to-back bookings.

steps.title: Create an event type
steps.description: This is what customers will book. Example: 'Free Estimate' or 'Phone Consultation'
substeps: Name it something clear like 'Free Estimate Call'
Set the duration (15 or 30 minutes is common)

steps.title: Get your booking link
steps.description: Calendly gives you a link that anyone can use to book with you.
substeps: Click 'Share' next to your event type
This is YOUR booking link — save it somewhere!

steps.title: Add it to your website and socials
steps.description: Put your booking link everywhere customers might find you.
substeps: Add a 'Book Now' button on your website
Put the link in your Instagram/Facebook bio
Include it in your email signature
Add it to your Google Business Profile

successMessage: Customers can now book directly on your calendar 24/7! You'll get an email notification for each booking.
proTips: Connect Calendly to your Google or Outlook calendar so it knows when you're busy
Add questions to the booking form — ask for their address or what they need help with
Set up text reminders so customers don't forget their appointment
